member.name: M:SAPLink.API.Controllers.ScheduleSyncs.Hourly(SAPLink.Domain.Models.System.RecurrenceHourlyDto)
member.summary: Returns Recurrence that will fires every hour at the specified minute.
member.param: 'Document' Valid value is ('Departments' or 'Items' or 'Vendors') - 'Interval' valid Value between (0-59) Minutes.

member.name: M:SAPLink.API.Controllers.ScheduleSyncs.Weekly(SAPLink.Domain.Models.System.RecurrenceDailyDto)
member.summary: Returns Recurrence that will fires to Sync Departments Every Day Of Week.
member.param: 'Document' Valid value is ('Departments' or 'Items' or 'Vendors'). - 'DayOfWeek' valid Values (Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday).
